reviews.text: Good location near to the high street shops, amazing facilities for a Watford station, helpful staff.

When I first entered Watford High Street station I was told that the London Euston train was cancelled and then another one came up but it was at headstone lane station and I was trying to get to London Euston & was having to wait a long time for the train to Euston then I encountered a lost backpack which I had to help give to customer service and then I had to go to Watford Junction station to get the fast train to Euston, staff were forgiving as I said sorry because of the asking

Clearer signs saying all stations are closed as you enter would be better as opposed to just Euston as it’s annoying when you’ve paid for a ticket at the station only to be told it’s closed and the fact your staff are playing on their phones watching you buy a ticket is even worse
A station next to Watford Junctiin, great Residential areas near by.
